name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: NePoLaBo performs the song 'Kimi to Natsu Fesu' in swimsuits at an outdoor stage with a pool.
A visual novel style scene where the members of NePoLaBo rest in a room and discuss their next performance ideas.

subtitles.original:
君と夏フェス
作詞・作曲：宮崎朝子
subtitles.english:
Kimi to Natsu Fesu (You and the Summer Festival)
Lyrics/Composition: Miyazaki Asako

subtitles.original: まだ照れ臭いあいつとフェスに
subtitles.english: Going to a festival with that guy I'm still shy around

subtitles.original: 行く約束をしたはいいけど
subtitles.english: I'm glad we made a promise to go, but

subtitles.original: あまりノってたら引かれそう
subtitles.english: If I get too into it, I might turn him off

subtitles.original: 控えめに楽しむって決めたんだ
subtitles.english: I've decided to enjoy it with some restraint

subtitles.original: でも私の大好きな
subtitles.english: But my favorite...

subtitles.original: ロックスター 真夏のステージで
subtitles.english: ...rock star, on the midsummer stage

subtitles.original: スーツを着たロックスター もう
subtitles.english: A rock star in a suit, already...

subtitles.original: 我慢できない！
subtitles.english: I can't take it anymore!

subtitles.original: 止まらないのは私の汗
subtitles.english: My sweat won't stop

subtitles.original: それとも君への気持ち？
subtitles.english: Or is it my feelings for you?

subtitles.original: 滴り落ちてく恋心
subtitles.english: My love is dripping down

subtitles.original: こぼれないようにすくってね
subtitles.english: Scoop it up so it doesn't spill

subtitles.original: 止まらないのは夏への期待
subtitles.english: My expectations for summer won't stop

subtitles.original: 忘れられない夏になるかも
subtitles.english: It might become an unforgettable summer

subtitles.original: 夏の日差しで焼け焦げそう
subtitles.english: I'm about to get scorched by the summer sun

subtitles.original: すべてがスローモーションになる
subtitles.english: Everything turns into slow motion

subtitles.original: 他人の汗もどうでもよくて
subtitles.english: I don't even care about other people's sweat

subtitles.original: 日差しの鬱陶しさも感じない
subtitles.english: I don't even feel the annoyance of the sunlight

subtitles.original: でも私の大好きなロックスター
subtitles.english: But my favorite rock star

subtitles.original: ラストの曲終わり
subtitles.english: At the end of the last song

subtitles.original: ロックスター 帰ってく
subtitles.english: The rock star leaves

subtitles.original: ライブが終わって我に返って
subtitles.english: The concert ends, I snap back to reality

subtitles.original: それから… それから…
subtitles.english: And then... and then...

subtitles.original: ずいぶん前のほうに来ちゃってたみたい
subtitles.english: It seems I've come quite far forward

subtitles.original: さっきまで二人がいた場所、もう違う景色
subtitles.english:
The place where we were just a moment ago
already looks like a different scene

subtitles.original: ああ、わたしやっちゃった 本気だったのに
subtitles.english: Ah, I blew it, even though I was serious

subtitles.original: うつむく私の隣に君が
subtitles.english: Beside me as I look down, you're there

subtitles.original: わたしの目を見つめる君 時間が止まってるみたい
subtitles.english:
You, staring into my eyes,
it's like time has stopped

subtitles.original: 少し笑って君はいう
subtitles.english: With a slight smile, you say

subtitles.original: 「新しい君が見れたから 今日は本当に来て良かった」
subtitles.english:
"I got to see a new side of you,
so I'm really glad I came today"

subtitles.original: 照れ笑いの奥見えちゃいそうで
subtitles.english:
It seems I can see into the depths
of your shy smile

subtitles.original: 私は焦って目をそらした
subtitles.english: I hurriedly looked away

subtitles.original: 止まらないのは二人の恋だ
subtitles.english: What won't stop is our love

subtitles.original: 今年の夏よ
subtitles.english: This year's summer,

subtitles.original: 終わらないでよ。
subtitles.english: please don't end.

subtitles.original: はあ～～～……遊んだ遊んだっ♪
subtitles.english: Whew... we really had a blast!♪

subtitles.original: もう、ぐったぐた…で、結局なーんも決まってないっていう(笑)
subtitles.english: I'm wiped out... and in the end, nothing's been decided (laughs)

subtitles.original: 制服、洗濯に出しちゃったし……今日の衣装、いつもの着替えしかないよ～
subtitles.english:
I sent my uniform to the laundry... so for today's outfit,
I only have my usual clothes to change into.

subtitles.original: もうこのままの格好で何かやるしかないねっ！
subtitles.english: We'll just have to do something in these outfits!

subtitles.original: でもさ、やっぱり私達にできることって…歌とダンス、かな～って思うんだよね～
subtitles.english:
But you know, I think what we can do best after all...
is singing and dancing.

subtitles.original: うん。変に気取らずに、”いつものわたしたち”を見せるのが一番かも
subtitles.english:
Yeah. Maybe showing "our usual selves"
without putting on airs is for the best.

subtitles.original: よしっ！じゃあ歌う曲決めようよ！！ねねは……エモい感じがいいなー。いつもと違う感じの！
subtitles.english:
Alright! Then let's decide on the songs!
As for me... I'd like something emotional. Something different from usual!

subtitles.original: ポルカは～恋愛ソングやってみたいなぁっ♪
subtitles.english: Polka~ wants to try a love song!♪

subtitles.original: ラミィは元気いっぱい！合いの手たっぷりの盛り上がるやつ！！
subtitles.english:
Lamy wants something full of energy!
A hype song with lots of call-and-response!!

subtitles.original: 歌詞がグッと心に来る系の曲もいいなぁ～
subtitles.english:
Songs with lyrics that really hit you in the heart
would be nice, too...
